body.p: Rapunzel and Flynn nervously wait out the guards trying their best to be as quiet as possible. The guards all searching all around them and one wrong move will give them away. Eventually the guards leave and they can take a deep breath, for now. They start again on their journey to see the floating lights but have no idea what else is in store for them on this trip.

Rapunzel loves the freedom of the outside world. In fact, she loves everything about the outside world, especially running barefoot through the grass. She dances with villagers, tries new food, and feels like she is becoming friends with Flynn.
